duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement Teams 365 as per government needs.
Collaborate and achieve projects aligned with mission goals.
Responsible for using Teams 365 for mission goals.
Work with IT and project leads to design, plan, and manage long mission goals.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Information Systems Management or related field, OR an Associate’s degree plus 7 years of recent specialized experience, OR a certification plus 7 years of recent specialized experience, OR eleven (11) total years of recent specialized experience.
Microsoft Certified IT Professional or Microsoft Certified Systems Engineer (MCSE)
